reference.shortdesc: Retrieves the value of the specified API property.

dlentry.dd: The xs:string that specifies the name of an API property.

section.title: Guidelines
section.p: The apim:get-api-property extension function retrieves the value of the specified API property.
You can also use apim:get-variable('api.properties.propertyname') to retrieve the value of the specified API property.

section.title: Results
section.p: The xs:string that contains the value of the API property.
